response.original_title: Neal Morse: Inner Circle DVD #1 – Jul 2005
response.overview: The video is divided into four parts, each offering a unique glimpse into Neal Morse’s world:  Part One features an intimate interview with Neal at home, where he sits at the piano and talks about his approach to writing music. It’s a candid look into his creative process.  Part Two shifts to a more lighthearted setting: the Morse brothers gathered around the dinner table with friends, singing funny songs and sharing laughs. It’s a warm, family-style jam session.  Part Three is a touching piano recital by Neal’s son, Wil. Wil plays piano while Neal joins him on guitar as they perform a heartfelt rendition of “Cradle to the Grave” together.  Part Four takes us to a live radio interview in Nashville, where Neal performs “Sing It High” and a few other songs live on the air. It’s a rollicking good time that captures the energy and spontaneity of a live show.
response.title: Neal Morse: Inner Circle DVD #1 – Jul 2005
